```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Manipulating Data

* `filter()` subset rows by value using logical operators
* `select()` subset rows by name & type


```{r}
gm <- c("Alex", "Ashton", "Brett", "Chris", "Dave", "Ian", "Jack", "Jon", "Katz", "Mikulich", "Nate", "Todd")
year <- c(2012:2019)
```

### Add Column (variable)
#### `mutate()`

```{r}
dues <-
    podium %>%
    select(year) %>% 
    mutate(
        dues = 60
    )
```


```{r}
dues
```

### Change Values in a Row

```{r}
dues %>% 
    filter(year == 2018:2019) %>%
    mutate(dues = 70)
```

```{r}
dues
```
